entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 9 except plus 3 over the Cypress Hills. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. 60 percent chance of flurries over the Cypress Hills. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High 9 except plus 3 over the Cypress Hills. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries changing to periods of snow this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 18 April 2023
